content.rendered:
Testimonials

“Seek not the favor of the multitude; it is seldom got by honest and lawful means. But seek the testimony of few; and number not voices, but weigh them.”

― Immanuel Kant

By far the highest quality wood furniture we have seen in India, it is at a world class level. The joinery, symmetry and finishing on the products is fantastic. I cannot stress enough how high the quality of the product is – very impressive.We liked the showroom which had a large range of furniture and we also liked that the website photos were an accurate reflection of the finished product – too often in India the end product does not match the photos and the showrooms are very small.The designer was fantastic at recommending appropriate colorway matches and recommending which furniture would look good together. The advice was genuine and was not targeted at trying to have us spend more. Furthermore, if you believed something would not look nice / was not an appropriate material you were able to provide a reason as to why and it was very much appreciated.Nice website, easy to navigate and photos were a great representation of the final product.

 5/5

JS, An Australian based in New Delhi

Very innovative designs and quality products available at Alankaram. Loved the coffee table that I ordered, it blends with my living room theme and enhances the visual appeal and makes it very elegant. Thanks to the team who updated me and followed up with my order to deliver it promptly inspite of the lockdown issues

 5/5

Dharani

The place has a very inviting vibe and the variety of creative furniture and color combinations in upholstery tug at you to explore every piece minutely. The enthusiastic young team of professionals put their 200% into creating classy furniture with wonderful finish options. As an architect, i can easily vouch that Alankaram is a class apart and one of its kind in India. Interacting with the team is very fulfilling. I wish them good luck and may they have many more hubs soon..

 5/5

Sonali

Alankaram is a great place to source wooden furniture of good quality. They have a design team that understands customer requirements and offers customisation – a special call out to Harsh who helped us with our set of custom centre tables. After few weeks of receiving the tables, the table top got scratched at our residence. We reached out to Harsh and he promptly responded by asking us to ship the table tops back to Alankaram, re-polished them and shipped them back to us free of charge! Very happy with their customer service. Wishing them great success in their venture that supports over 200 artisan families!

 5/5

Supriyaa

The high chairs we have picked from Alankaram are not just good looking but super comfortable as well. They are worth the money we spent. They know the art of making a good comfortable chair.

 5/5

Shilpa

Our Alankaram furniture is so beautiful and high quality, beloved acquisitions for our ‘first home’. It is, in fact, some of the only furniture we couldn’t part with and decided to ship abroad when we left India. We had a small issue with a chair after a couple of years of use that was promptly fixed and shipped in no time. Customer service is excellent too!

 5/5

Ruhi

Alankaram is doing a great job! Their product range, design sense,furniture quality, pre and post sales services are all fabulous! We are very happy with what we have purchased from them and will definitely use them in the future, as well as recommend them to others.

 5/5

Avantika

Very good design and workmanship. Slim features but very sturdy design. Unique and excellent service by expert team. Wishing Alankaram furniture great future.

 5/5

Satish A.

I was looking for furniture to our new villa. I have personally went to many stores where I were never satisfied with the things I saw. It was in Instagram the first time I saw ALANKARAM . I was really very impressed by their furniture collections. VAKRA really impressed me a lot and it added perfect beauty to my living room. Soon I texted Hash who gudied me in choosing colour, texture of fabric and and they promised me to deliver on time with proper care. As mentioned they kept their work and promise . I was very happy to receive my furniture which is the best collection in our villa. Love it , keep rocking and surprise us with more of your collections.

 5/5

Ranjitha

Seeing all the furniture taking place at our home yesterday, I could not resist to let you know how grateful we are for all that you have created for us ….
Each piece of furniture has its own charm and I cannot find enough adjectives to describe the same …My children are extremely happy for how there respective rooms have turned out …The intricacies, finish and paints are leaving us spell bound .Though we have pushed you a lot to rush things up,, I cannot miss this chance to say how glad we are on our decision to choose you to design what we have today ..

 5/5

- Mrs P. J. N. from Surat

Alankaram has some of the unique furniture designs. the team is professional, committed towards quality and delivery timelines. The team provides suggestions and guidance on furniture customization, also have good customization options for upholstery available for selection. Customer service is exceptional and makes online experience as close as it can be to visiting online.

 5/5

Simit

Great work!!
I genuinely appreciate Anupriya Sahu and her Alankaram team mates for their creative ideas and the dedication they put in every piece of furniture that comes out of their store.The combination of upholstery are very unique and they even go to extreme of hand painting which are truly remarkable. Excellent job!

 5/5

Kavitha S

I had been searching for the right kind of single seater sofas for my living room for quite a while and happened to stumble upon Alankaram online and liked their modern and clean aesthetic .Thanks to the help offered by Mr. Harsh I was able to see quite a range of both furniture designs and fabric options and zeroed in on the one I liked. The ordering process was very seamless and my order was delivered quite promptly ( considering it was made to order) despite a specific customization I wanted. On delivery, the sofas were exactly as per design, with great finish and attention to detail! Would certainly recommend this!

 5/5

Charchit

Great designs, not flashy, subtle and stylish, brand new designs
Reasonably priced, great quality and finish, Good packaging and delivery.
This summarizes Alankaram products. Not much advertised, but very professional folks that you would be comfortable working with on your new projects.They also some level of customization.

 5/5

Srinivasan

I had ordered a centre table and side tables..the manufacturing details were as shown online.product is very good..prompt helpful personnel. Always ready to guide you regarding customisation of products..

 5/5

Veenita

Unique designs with beautiful finish concentrated on every single detail and comfort. A well balance between aesthetic and comfort. Not too pricey. Worth every cent. Wide range of choices in fabrics too. A beautiful experience.

 5/5

Akila

While it is evident from their Instagram page and the website that the range of furniture offered by Alankaram is both novel and exciting, My intent through this review is to recount my experience of buying their products online. I had stumbled upon Alankaram’s Instagram page over the course of the lockdown and was immediately drawn to a few articles of furniture. However, I was skeptical about them given the fact that I wouldn’t have gotten the opportunity to inspect the product prior to purchasing it . At the least I had decided to connect with them over the phone to gain more information. Upon connecting with them, they were quick to respond with the details and had assigned an executive to guide me through the process. From the word go, I must say that the entire process of buying their products was very seamless. Right from patiently customising the products to our specifications, to having it delivered to us in Hyderabad, the work was done in an expeditious way. I ended up opting for a couch, a couple of accent chair, a table and dining chairs. I am happy to attest to the fact that both the quantity and the aesthetic value of the furniture are excellent. The only point of criticism would be towards the image quality of the furniture on the website. While they have circumvented that by having a fantastic Instagram page, I believe that they could instill a lot of trust in their potential customers if the image quality on their website was improved.

 5/5

Nitesh T.

By far the highest quality wood furniture we have seen in India, it is at a world class level. The joinery, symmetry and finishing on the products is fantastic. I cannot stress enough how high the quality of the product is – very impressive.We liked the showroom which had a large range of furniture and we also liked that the website photos were an accurate reflection of the finished product – too often in India the end product does not match the photos and the showrooms are very small. The designer was fantastic at recommending appropriate colorway matches and recommending which furniture would look good together. The advice was genuine and was not targeted at trying to have us spend more. Furthermore, if you believed something would not look nice / was not an appropriate material you were able to provide a reason as to why and it was very much appreciated.Nice website, easy to navigate and photos were a great representation of the final product.

JS, An Australian based in New Delhi

Mrs P. J. N. from Surat

The ordering process was very seamless and my order was delivered quite promptly ( considering it was made to order) despite a specific customization. I wanted. On delivery, the sofas were exactly as per design, with great finish and attention to detail! Would certainly recommend this!

Charchit

Alankaram is a great place to source wooden furniture of good quality. They have a design team that understands customer requirements and offers customisation – a special call out to Harsh who helped us with our set of custom centre tables. After few weeks of receiving the tables, the table top got scratched at our residence. We reached out to Harsh and he promptly responded by asking us to ship the table tops back to Alankaram, re-polished them and shipped them back to us free of charge! Very happy with their customer service. Wishing them great success in their venture that supports over 200 artisan families!

Supriya

Not much advertised, but very professional folks that you would be comfortable working with on your new projects.They also some level of customization

Srinivasan
